description:
Crush Kickstarter is YOUR intro course into the world of crowdfunding success. Our short mini course is designed to show you the ropes of Kickstarter, create a strong foundation from which to build your crowdfunding campaign and save the time and hassle of researching everything yourself.

The video course includes screencasted guides, video discussions and highlight summaries to take even the novice crowdfunding creator up to a level of campaign success and prominence.

The entire mini course can be completed in a day or two if your crowdfunding campaign is rushed but it's really advisable to spend more time fine tuning and researching your product success.

Take this course only if you are serious about building a business and launching a product and want to use Kickstarter or Indiegogo to make this dream happen!
title: Crush Kickstarter: The Crowdfund Academy
